org.apache.catalina.filters

类 ExpiresFilter.XServletOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • javax.servlet.ServletOutputStream
        • org.apache.catalina.filters.ExpiresFilter.XServletOutputStream
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    封闭类:
    ExpiresFilter

    public class ExpiresFilter.XServletOutputStream
extends ServletOutputStream
    Wrapping extension of ServletOutputStream to trap the "Start Write Response Body" event.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      XServletOutputStream(ServletOutputStream servletOutputStream, HttpServletRequest request, ExpiresFilter.XHttpServletResponse response)
